DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare Symbicort® Turbuhaler® Pulmicort® Turbuhaler® Bricanyl® Turbuhaler® treatment asthma discharge emergency room
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Asthma Relapse After Discharge From Emergency
DOC.criteria: 18 65 year age Presenting study emergency department asthma exacerbation Admission hospital Patients receive 2000 µg/day beclomethasone equivalent inhale corticosteroid ( 1000 µg/day fluticasone 1600 µg/day budesonide )
